nodes.speaker: narrator
nodes.text: You see a suspicious-looking fortune cookie standing in line. Who knows what message this peculiar dessert can bring you.

nodes.speaker: fortune cookie
nodes.text: Psss kid. Listen, you’re surrounded by all these sugary desserts, they’re gonna give you a sugar addiction. Why not skip straight to the last part? I got the right thing for you. Baking flour.

nodes.speaker: fortune cookie
nodes.text: I got whachu need. Hand over the chips.

nodes.speaker: fortune cookie
nodes.text: Pleasure doin’ business. Don’t overdose on carbs, kid.
